name: Thanks Earth
description:
▶  Fullscreen is recommended. Click the game after it started to get the control.

Thanks Earth

Thanks Earth is a platform game but I changed one thing.

Control:
Keyboard, Controller or Mouse
M - Mute the music
R - Restart

It started as a one-week prototype for Prototype Studio, then I finished it in Action Game Studio.

Instructor: Bennett Foddy (Prototype Studio), Gabe Cuzzillo (Action Game Studio)

Dec 2020, NYU Game Center
